description: Contains individual line items for each sales order, including quantity, pricing, and product details.

columns.name: OrderLineID
columns.description: Primary key. Unique identifier for each order line.

columns.name: OrderID
columns.description: Foreign key to Sales.Orders for the parent order.

columns.name: StockItemID
columns.description: Foreign key to Warehouse.StockItems for the product ordered.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Description of the item as it appears on the order.

columns.name: PackageTypeID
columns.description: Foreign key to Warehouse.PackageTypes for the packaging used.

columns.name: TaxRate
columns.description: Tax rate percentage applied to this line.

columns.name: PickedQuantity
columns.description: Number of units picked from warehouse.

columns.name: PickingCompletedWhen
columns.description: Timestamp when picking was completed for this line.

columns.name: LastEditedBy
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.People for last editor.
